mapper.select: select find_code_name(100, v.dcode) as division, v.CREDIT,v.grade,v.lname, p.pname, p.email, p.PPHONE, l.*, m.DNAME, m.MNAME, r.LRNAME, p.PSTATUS, s.w1, s.w2, s.w3, s.w4, s.w5, s.w6, s.w7, s.w8, s.w9, s.w10, s.w11, s.w12, s.w13, s.w14, s.w15, s.w16,s.content from lecture_info v, LECTURE l, professor p, MAJOR_VIEW m, LECTURE_ROOM r, study_plan s where v.LNUM = l.LNUM and l.pid = p.pid and l.opennum = s.opennum and p.mcode = m.mcode and l.LRCODE = r.LRCODE and l.lyear = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY') and l.PID = #{pid}

select p.pid, p.pname,FIND_CODE_NAME(210,p.PSTATUS)as pstatus, p.EMAIL, p.PPHONE, p.PBIRTH, p.PGENDER, mv.DNAME, mv.MNAME, FIND_CODE_NAME(220,p.position) as position FROM PROFESSOR P, MAJOR_VIEW MV WHERE P.MCODE = MV.MCODE AND P.PID = #{pid}
